IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO DEVELOP A DIVERSE CORPS OF LEADERS FOR VOLUNTEER COMMUNITY SERVICE AND THE CULTIVATION OF SHARED RESPONSIBILITY IN THE REGION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO DEVELOP A DIVERSE CORPS OF LEADERS FOR VOLUNTEER COMMUNITY SERVICE AND THE CULTIVATION OF SHARED RESPONSIBILITY IN THE REGION.
IRS990.Desc: THE COMMUNITY LEADERSHIP SERIES AIMS TO ENHANCE THE COMMUNITY'S FUTURE BY EXPANDING THE SKILLS OF TOMORROW'S LEADERS THROUGH A NINE MONTH PROGRAM. THE 2017-2018 COMMUNITY LEADERSHIP SERIES GRADUATED 44 BUSINESS LEADERS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: THE EXECUTIVE LEADERSHIP SERIES IS A FIVE SESSION PROGRAM DESIGNED TO ENHANCE THE ATTENDEE'S UNDERSTANDING OF THE REGION'S ACTIVITIES, EVENTS AND RESOURCES. THE 2017 EXECUTIVE LEADERSHIP SERIES GRADUATED 20 BUSINESS LEADERS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: APPROXIMATELY 106 NON PROFIT LEADERS ATTEND A HALF-DAY CONFERENCE DESIGNED TO HELP INCREASE ORGANIZATION EFFECTIVENESS AND IMPROVE MANAGEMENT PRACTICES.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: COMMUNITY SOLUTIONS AND SUPPORT SERVICES - THESE COMMUNITY OUTREACH PROGRAMS CONSIST OF MANAGEMENT OF ANNUAL TEAM PROJECTS FOR NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS; BOARD MEMBER AND VOLUNTEER REFERRALS TO NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS AND COMMUNITY GROUPS; COMMUNITY PRESENTATIONS AND WORKSHOP FACILITATION FOR NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS, BUSINESSES, AND COMMUNITY GROUPS; PUBLICATION AND DISTRIBUTION OF MONTHLY NEWSLETTER; MANAGEMENT OF "EVENTSAVVY" EVENT PLANNING WEBSITE; PRESENTATION OF THE EXTRA MILE AWARD; AND STRATEGIC COUNSELING AND COMMUNICIATIONS WITH NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS, COMMUNITY GROUPS AND LEADERSHIP HARRISBURG AREA ALUMNI. BEYOND LEADERSHIP - THIS FULL DAY TRAINING TEACHES THE ESSENTIAL OF SERVANT LEADERSHIP, AN ORIGINAL CURRICULUM DEVELOPED BY LEADERSHIP HARRISBURG AREA STAFF.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SPENDING POLICY ADOPTED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS STIPULATES INCOME IS TO BE USED FOR SCHOLARSHIPS AND OTHER APPROVED PROGRAMS.
THE ORGANIZATION BELIEVES THAT IT HAS APPROPRIATE SUPPORT FOR ANY TAX POSITIONS TAKEN, AND AS SUCH, DOES NOT HAVE ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT ARE MATERIAL TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XI, LINE 2D
SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XII, LINE 2D

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMMUNITY SOLUTIONS AND SUPPORT SERVICES - THESE COMMUNITY OUTREACH PROGRAMS CONSIST OF MANAGEMENT OF ANNUAL TEAM PROJECTS FOR NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS; BOARD MEMBER AND VOLUNTEER REFERRALS TO NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS AND COMMUNITY GROUPS; COMMUNITY PRESENTATIONS AND WORKSHOP FACILITATION FOR NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS, BUSINESSES, AND COMMUNITY GROUPS; PUBLICATION AND DISTRIBUTION OF MONTHLY NEWSLETTER; MANAGEMENT OF "EVENTSAVVY" EVENT PLANNING WEBSITE; PRESENTATION OF THE EXTRA MILE AWARD; AND STRATEGIC COUNSELING AND COMMUNICIATIONS WITH NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS, COMMUNITY GROUPS AND LEADERSHIP HARRISBURG AREA ALUMNI. BEYOND LEADERSHIP - THIS FULL DAY TRAINING TEACHES THE ESSENTIAL OF SERVANT LEADERSHIP, AN ORIGINAL CURRICULUM DEVELOPED BY LEADERSHIP HARRISBURG AREA STAFF.
BOARD RECEIVES THE 990 AND COPIES OF THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS TO REVIEW PRIOR TO FILING.
OFFICERS SIGN CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENTS ANNUALLY AND ALL BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO SIGN.

A SELECTION COMMITTEE OF VOLUNTEERS AND BOARD MEMBERS DETERMINED THE ORIGINAL COMPENSATION PACKAGE FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR. SUBSEQUENT REVIEW AND CHANGES IN COMPENSATION HAVE BEEN CONDUCTED BY THE BOARD CHAIR AND DESIGNEES. OTHER KEY EMPLOYEES ARE COMPENSATED BASED ON MERIT AND THE PROCESS DID NOT INCLUDE COMPARABILITY DATA BUT WAS ALSO APPROVED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.
